articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Beninese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Beninese President
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Patrice Talon, president of the Republic of Benin, on the 56th anniversary of its independence.
					 Wishing the Beninese president and people bigger success in their efforts for stability and prosperity of the country, the message hoped that the traditional friendly and cooperative ties between the DPRK and Benin would grow stronger in various fields.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Surveys of Industrial Establishments in Areas of Pukchang, Tokchon
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Surveys of Industrial Establishments in Areas of Pukchang, Tokchon
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made field surveys of major industrial establishments in the areas of Pukchang and Tokchon.
					 The premier visited the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex, Jenam and Namyang coal mines of the Tokchon Area Coal-Mining Complex to acquaint himself in detail with their production and the projects to increase their capacities.
					
					 There took place consultative meetings of officials concerned on the spots.
					
					 The meetings discussed the issues of operating generating equipment in full capacity, increasing coal production at cutting faces and pushing ahead with the projects to increase their capacities under a long-term plan.
					
					 They took the measures to enhance the roles of technicians and skilled workers, increase the rate of the automation of production processes and turn the relevant units into manpower-saving industrial establishments.
					
					 Meantime, the premier learned on the spot about the technical specifications of the new model 5-ton truck made by the Sungri Automobile Complex and discussed the orientation of its technical remodeling.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists' Plan to Set up Bio-Chemical Weapons Laboratory in S. Korea Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists' Plan to Set up Bio-Chemical Weapons Laboratory in S. Korea Slammed
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggression forces decided to set up a biological and chemical weapons laboratory studying highly toxic germs of high lethality like anthrax and botulinus under what it called "Jupiter plan".
					 Under this plan necessary personnel and hardware are supposed to be brought into Pusan Port by this November and the project is due to commence from next year.
					
					 The Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army in a statement Monday said that the "Jupiter plan" pursued by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces is pursuant to the scenario to wage a biological and chemical warfare at a time of fighting a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' act of leaving no barbarous means and ways untried to invade the DPRK urges the army and people to harden their immutable will to take retaliation against the U.S., the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are the sworn enemy and murderers who indiscriminately massacred the Koreans through germ and chemical warfare far back during the last Korean War.
					
					 After the war the U.S. imperialists massively introduced into south Korea weapons of mass destruction including biological and chemical weapons in a bid to annihilate the Korean nation and yet they did not forward any notice about it to the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The number of germ warfare experiments conducted by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea remains shrouded in the mists and no one can estimate the amount of highly poisonous chemical substances now stockpiled there.
					
					 At a time when the whole world is aspiring after peace and security, the U.S. imperialist aggression forces are making preparations for germ warfare as evidenced by the plan to set up the biological and chemical weapons laboratory in south Korea. This can never be tolerated.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' hideous scheme for germ warfare clearly teaches the army and people of the DPRK how they have to approach the imminent confrontation with the U.S. 
					
					 The army of the DPRK is fully ready to counter any form of war mode wanted by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' hideous moves to inflict the holocaust of germ warfare upon the Korean nation are bound to invite stern punishment.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Leaves for African Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Leaves for African Countries
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry led by Vice-Minister Sin Hong Chol left here on Monday to visit some African countries.

articles.title: Korean Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Korean Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- The Korean preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Pyongyang on Monday.
					 2017 is a significant year which greets the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the 100th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and the 5th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, Pak Song Il, vice-chairman of the Central Broadcasting Committee of Korea, and O Yong Chol, vice-minister of Culture, vice-chairmen of the preparatory committee and Pak Kyong Il, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, secretary general of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse activities to introduce and add shine to the greatness and exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and make meticulous arrangements to let the Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu be held in Pyongyang and on Mt. Paektu in 2017 successfully in close contact with the preparatory committees formed in regions and countries throughout the world.
					
					 Preparatory committees for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu have been formed in Asia-Pacific, European, African, American, Oceanian and Arab regions and more than 60 preparatory committees in about 50 foreign countries so far reflecting the unanimous aspiration and desire of the world progressive people. They are conducting colorful activities.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Body
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Body
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Monday by head of the visiting delegation of the Japan-Korea Friendship Linking with Juche Takashi Koiwai, vice-chairman of the Japan Matsumoto Citizens Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Delegation
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from a delegation of the Japan-Korea Friendship Linking with Juche on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned on Monday by the head of the delegation Takashi Koiwai, vice-chairman of the Japan Matsumoto Citizens Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Radish Pickled with Rice-bran
articles.content:
Radish Pickled with Rice-bran
Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Radish pickled with rice-bran is getting popular among the people in the DPRK.
					 In this regard, Choe Chun Ran, a cook of Chongryu Restaurant No.2 under the Taedonggang District Restaurants Management Office in Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					Radish pickled with rice-bran is peculiar in taste and highly nutritive.
					
					It takes 30-40 days to have pickled radish ripened. And it is rich in phosphor, iron and other inorganic substances and vitamins like B1.
					
					It produces a good effect on preventing constipation and hypertension and is considered to be efficacious for diabetes.

articles.title: World-level Sanitary Goods Produced at Silk Mill
articles.content:
World-level Sanitary Goods Produced at Silk Mill
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- A modern sanitary goods production process has been recently established at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill in the DPRK.
					 According to Kim Myong Hwan, manager of the mill, the process is equipped with home-made facilities and consists of raw material preparation, molding, disinfection and check parts.
					
					 The production of sanitary goods there, from raw material feeding to packing, is put on a streamline basis.
					
					 The shelf life of goods is two-three years and their quality is of world level.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Il Sung's Exploits Performed for National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Il Sung's Exploits Performed for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an article to the 25th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Achieve the Great Unity of Our Nation".
					 The work published on Aug. 1, Juche 80 (1991) indicates the principles and ways for achieving the great unity of the Korean nation.
					
					 It comprehensively deals with the idea that the great unity of the nation is fundamental to the country's independent and peaceful reunification and constitutes its essence and that the Korean nation should unite close as one to fulfill its responsibility and role as the driving force of the national reunification, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung in his work clarified the ideological basis of the great unity of the nation and its fundamental principle. The ideological basis of the great national unity clarified by him is patriotism and the spirit of national independence and its main principle is that all compatriots should place the interests common to the nation above all irrespective of ideology, social system and religious belief and subordinate everything to the cause of national reunification.
					
					 In the work he specified tasks and ways for achieving the great national unity such as the issue of positively developing the contact, visit and dialogue between the fellow countrymen at home and abroad, the issue of boosting the nation-wide solidarity in the struggle for national reunification and the issue of achieving the organizational alliance of all political parties, organizations, compatriots of various circles in the north and the south and abroad in the struggle for national reunification.
					
					 The dynamic advance of the June 15 era of reunification in which the north-south relations of mistrust and confrontation dramatically turned into those of national reconciliation and unity and the events unprecedented in the history of the nation took place clearly proved the validity and vitality of Kim Il Sung's idea and line of the great national unity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Face up to Changed Situation and Behave Itself
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Face up to Changed Situation and Behave Itself
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. had better face up to the strategic climate newly created on the Korean peninsula and the trend of the times and behave itself, urges Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is persistently ignoring the changed situation on the Korean peninsula and desperately finding fault with the DPRK while resorting to nuclear threat and blackmail and war drumbeats. This is like the guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 What the U.S. is now doing can never bring the present changed times back to those in the past.
					
					 The U.S. has long resorted to nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK for not yielding to its pressure while paying no heed to the latter's demand for denuclearizing the whole of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The historical lesson prompted the DPRK to decide to have access to strong nuclear force, treasured sword of justice. And it emerged a great nuclear power admired by the world.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal disturbing the denuclearization of the peninsula and sparking off a nuclear arms race as it has persistently posed nuclear threat and blackmail and staged ceaseless joint military drills, gravely threatening the security of the DPRK pursuant to its anachronistic hostile policy toward it. The U.S. can never evade the responsibility for them.
					
					 The U.S. increasing nuclear threat to the DPRK would only prompt the latter to escalate its nuclear threat to the former. The U.S., a nuclear rogue state, is only fated to suffer the nightmare of unending uneasiness and horror.
					
					 The U.S. maximization of threat to the DPRK by introducing nuclear strategic assets would compel the latter to spur the bolstering of nuclear deterrence.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Farce Staged by U.S., S. Korea on Day of Armistice
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Farce Staged by U.S., S. Korea on Day of Armistice
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean puppet regime on July 27 held such funny charade as an "event marking the 63rd anniversaries of the Armistice Agreement and the UN forces' entry into the Korean war" in a bid to shake off the disgrace and ill-fame as losers.
					 Great irony was that the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea with the cap of the commander of "UN forces," antiquity of history, on his head blustered at the event that the Armistice Agreement (AA) prevented the recurrence of the war and they have properly reacted to the sustainable provocations of the DPRK with the AA as a lever.
					
					 Right after his speech, the prime minister of the puppet regime of south Korea cried out for resolutely reacting to any provocation from the north, trumpeting about "a stringent security posture" and "close cooperation with the international community". He exactly looked like a running dog of a master.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says: 
					
					 What the American master and his local stooge uttered was intended to incite hostility toward the DPRK, keeping the ignominious defeat the U.S. and its vassal forces suffered in the war buried into oblivion, and thus put spurs to the moves to unleash a war against the DPRK.
					
					 It is just the U.S. and the puppet regime in the world that "commemorate" the shameful defeat and heavy casualties in the war.
					
					 They have been busy with the smear campaign to paint the defeat in the 1950s in the last century and the total failure of the hostile policy pursued towards the DPRK for several decades as "victory".
					
					 Their ulterior purpose is to ignite the second Korean war at any cost and seek revenge for their past defeat. However, it is no more than a chimera.
					
					 They managed to survive the Korean war after signing the surrender document, but they will meet a miserable end in the face of the merciless retaliatory strike of the revolutionary armed forces of Songun Korea, with no one left to sign the surrender document, once they start another war.

articles.title: National Bodies in S. Korea Denounce U.S., Japan Crimes
articles.content:
National Bodies in S. Korea Denounce U.S., Japan Crimes
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Organizations in south Korea including the Council for the Peaceful Unification of Tangun's Nation made public a statement on July 29 condemning the criminal acts of the U.S. and Japan.
					 It said that the "Katsura-Taft Agreement" was a product of the criminal collusion between the U.S. and Japan in violating and plundering Korea of its territory and sovereignty to meet their interests.
					
					 It accused Japan of busying itself to revive militarism as evidenced by its denial of the forcible drafting of Koreans and its crimes related to sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and its claim to Tok islets.
					
					 Japan adopted the "security legislation" to support the exercise of "the right to collective self-defense" for its rearmament and the U.S. promptly welcomed it, the statement charged.
					
					 It urged the U.S. and Japan to make apology and reparation for the crimes they perpetrated against the Korean nation.

articles.title: July Issue of Magazine of International Kothongryon Released
articles.content:
July Issue of Magazine of International Kothongryon Released
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon) released the July issue of its monthly magazine Thongil.
					 The magazine highlights the revolutionary activities of supreme leader Kim Jong Un illustrated with his photos.
					
					 It conveys news that he provided field guidance to the ballistic rocket firing drill of the Hwasong artillery units of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Fish Food Factory under Unit 810 of the KPA and met with the special envoy of the first secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Cuba and his party. 
					
					 It specially edited an article titled "The Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum in photos" on the 63rd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Introducing the museum which was opened after being successfully remodeled on the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war, the magazine carried 39 photos showing the monument of the victory in the war and groups of sculptures outside the museum and its lobby, hall of heroes, exhibition halls showing the course of the war and major battles and enemy weapons and combat equipment captured by the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 It dealt with the stands of officials of different countries of the world opposing the THAAD deployment in south Korea, a protest statement that the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia sent to the south Korean embassy in Moscow and information analyzing the military and technical problems of THAAD and its negative impact on the regional and global peace and security. 
					
					 It also introduced actions of people from all walks of life in south Korea including the news that inhabitants in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea, the place chosen as the site  for THAAD deployment, staged strong protest action,  pelting the puppet prime minister of south Korea with eggs.
					
					 The magazine carried an article written by the section chief of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences which said that the DPRK made positive proposals including the great national conference for reunification aimed at opening dialogue between the north and the south and improving their relations, but the south Korean authorities denied the dialogue and are persisting in sanctions against the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Confucianists Protest against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Confucianists Protest against THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Eight Confucianists bodies in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on July 27 opposing the decision of the regime to deploy THAAD.
					 An appeal demanding the retraction of the deployment plan was read out at the conference.
					
					 The unilateral decision made by sacrificing the people under the pretext of security cannot be overlooked, the appeal said, adding:
					
					 Songsan-ri, Songju County which was chosen as a site for THAAD is only 1.5 km from the township of the county and most of its residents are living near it. So it is giving rise to big uneasiness.
					
					 Stressing the need to preserve historical relics in the vicinity of the site, the appeal demanded the authorities immediately withdraw the plan.
					
					 Then, the bodies released an appeal to the people.
					
					 It urged the regime to inform the county headman within a week of the reason why the county was chosen as a site for THAAD, noting the decision is null and void as it was made without any briefing for the residents.
					
					 At the end of the conference, the organizations handed the appeal to a man concerned of Chongwadae.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- The world progressive people paid high tribute to President Kim Il Sung on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 Formed were remembrance committees consisting of figures of political and social circles in many countries including Iran, India, Bangladesh, Indonesia, Ethiopia, Uganda, South Africa, DR Congo, Austria, Iceland, France, Spain and Venezuela and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions.
					
					 The remembrance committees widely introduced works and feats of the President and significantly organized colorful events.
					
					 Talks, articles and statements were issued by figures of political and social circles and organizations including the general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, the honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union and the vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil.
					
					 They praised the President as the benevolent father of the people, greatest outstanding leader representing the 20th century and peerlessly great man who devoted himself to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 The king and the great queen of Cambodia sent large floral baskets to the DPRK Embassy in Phnom Penh and figures of governments, political parties and organizations of many countries visited the DPRK missions in their countries to lay floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the full-length pictures and paintings depicting the great leaders standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 World media gave wide publicity to the revolutionary history of the President around July 8.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by German Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by German Organization
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Invincible and iron-willed commander" was posted by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on its website on July 27, the 63rd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The article said:
					
					 The Fatherland Liberation War was a fierce one between the young DPRK on one side and the U.S. which had a 100-odd-year long history of aggression and which boasted of being "the strongest" in the world and its15 satellites, the south Korean puppet army and the remnants of the Imperial Japanese Army on the other side.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung advanced the scientific and original military idea for war victory on the principle that the servicemen and popular masses are the masters in fighting a war.
					
					 He took the initiative with the outstanding commanding art and original tactics in the whole period of war and led all operations and battles to victory.
					
					 The great Fatherland Liberation War ended with the shining victory of the DPRK thanks to Comrade Kim Il Sung, an invincible and iron-willed commander.
					
					 The immortal exploits for war victory performed by him will shine forever in history.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany opened the internet photo exhibition on the same day.
					
					 Photos of Kim Il Sung organizing and leading the Fatherland Liberation War to victory were posted by the organization on its website.
					
					 Also posted there were photos showing the struggle of the Korean army and people during the war and ones showing the U.S. imperialists and their followers that sustained defeat.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Anniversary Marked in Peru, Thailand
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Anniversary Marked in Peru, Thailand
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Figures of Peru and Thailand issued statements on July 27, the 63rd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Javier Gradin, director of the International Affairs Department of the Ample Front of Peru, said:
					
					 July 27 is the day when the U.S. was defeated by the heroic Korean people.
					
					 But the U.S. has long embellished their defeat as "victory".
					
					 It is mulling distorting history but it was defeated in the Korean war.
					
					 Today's DPRK has nuclear weapons and is a strong country which defends the sovereignty of the nation while making rapid development despite the most severe economic sanctions which no other country has suffered yet.
					
					 Chanai Longoen, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, said:
					
					 The great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War--this was a page of proud advance which promised the prosperity and bright future for the Korean people but the beginning of bitter defeat and ruin for the U.S.
					
					 The Korean people defeated the U.S. and won victory thanks to President Kim Il Sung's extraordinary commanding art and their united efforts rallied close around him.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Anniversary Marked in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Anniversary Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Russian media carried special write-ups on July 27, the 63rd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 An internet magazine posted an article under the title of "Meaning of Korean war" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The magazine said:
					
					 The Korean war was the one between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is the provoker of the war and the DPRK the winner.
					
					 The shining victory of the DPRK was a fruition of the brilliant strategy and the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 An article titled "U.S. bitter defeat" was posted by the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website with an art piece showing the hostile feelings of the DPRK army and people against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The article said that under the guidance of the President the DPRK army and people created the myth of defeating the U.S. imperialists which boasted of being "the strongest" in the world. It went on:
					
					 The defeat of the U.S. in the Korean war can neither be retrieved nor written off.
					
					 The U.S. should not forget the lesson from the Korean war.
					
					 If the U.S. ignites a war against the DPRK again, it is bound to meet ruin.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Libya
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Libya
Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- A Libyan preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed.
					 The chairman of the Libya-DPRK Friendship Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Brazil
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Brazil
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- A Brazilian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed.
					 Acilino Riveiro, chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Nature Museum, Central Zoo in Pyongyang Introduced by Media of China, Myanmar
articles.content:
Nature Museum, Central Zoo in Pyongyang Introduced by Media of China, Myanmar
 Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- Chinese media and Myanmar TV introduced the Nature Museum and the Central Zoo of the DPRK on July 25 and 27.
					 The Chinese Huan Qiu Shibao said:
					
					 The Nature Museum and the Central Zoo situate at the foot of Mt. Taesong in Pyongyang. 
					
					 The appearance of the Central Zoo was radically changed.
					
					 The entrance to the Central Zoo portrays a tiger of Mt. Paektu with its mouth with sharp teeth fully open.
					
					 The Korean people regard the tiger of Mt. Paektu as the spirit of the nation against imperialism.
					
					 The Nature Museum newly built in a little more than one year covers 35 000 square meters.
					
					 The Nature Museum and the Central Zoo of the DPRK are monumental edifices.
					
					 The Myanmar TV said:
					
					 The Nature Museum and the Central Zoo were built to be peculiar according to the far-reaching plan of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The Nature Museum covering vast areas is a mass educational and science research and dissemination base and leisure complex as it house the Space Hall, Paleozoic Era Hall, Mesozoic Era Hall, Cenozoic Era Hall, Animals Hall, Plants Hall, Gifts Hall, E-Library and Sci-tech Disseminating Room. 
					
					 More than 40 animal sheds such as the Shed of Reptiles, Shed of Monkeys, Shed of Beasts, Shed of Elephants, Shed of Giraffes and Shed of Small Horses have been peculiarly built.
					
					 Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD. and Ta Kung Pao in Hong Kong, China carried photo-accompanied articles introducing the Nature Museum and the Central Zoo.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre empresas importantes de Pukchang y Tokchon
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre empresas importantes de Pukchang y Tokchon
Pyongyang, primero de agosto (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju estudio en el terreno las gestiones de las empresas importantes en las regiones de Pukchang y Tokchon.
					Recorrio el Complejo Termoelectrico de Pukchang, las minas de carbon de Jenam y Namyang del Complejo Carbonifero de la Region de Tokchon y otros lugares averiguando en detalles el estado de produccion y de las obras de ampliacion de capacidad.
					
					En las consultas de funcionarios interesados celebradas en el terreno, se discutieron los problemas para asegurar el pleno funcionamiento de equipos generadores, aumentar la produccion por galerias de explotacion de carbon y realizar con vistas al futuro las obras para aumentar la capacidad.
					
					Se tomaron las medidas para elevar el papel de tecnicos y obreros calificados, incrementar el porcentaje de automatizacion del proceso productivo y transformar las unidades correspondientes en las empresas ahorradoras de la mano de obra.
					
					Por otra parte, Pak Pong Ju examino en el Complejo Automovilistico Sungri las especificaciones tecnicas del camion de carga de 5 toneladas de nuevo tipo y debatio el rumbo de reconstruccion tecnica del complejo.

articles.title: Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom condena plan de guerra bioquimica de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom condena plan de guerra bioquimica de EE.UU. 
Pyongyang, primero de agosto (ACNC) -- En los ultimos tiempos, el ejercito agresor norteamericano presento el llamado "plan de Jupiter" y decidio construir en el Sur de Corea el laboratorio de armas bioquimicas para estudiar los microbios muy toxicos de alta mortalidad como los bacilos de antracosis y botulinus.
					De acuerdo con este plan, introducira hasta el noviembre de este ano en el Puerto de Pusan los personajes y los equipos necesarios y comenzara la obra desde el ano que viene.
					
					En su nota publicada hoy, la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom pone al desnudo que el "plan" en cuestion de los uniformados yanquis se practica segun el malsano intento de desarrollar la guerra bioquimica en la guerra de agresion a la RPDC, y continua:
					
					Las tentativas del imperio yanqui, que no vacila en emplear todos los metodos y medios bestiales para agredir a la RPDC, hacen redoblar mas al ejercito y pueblo coreanos su invariable voluntad de vengarse de los yanquis.
					
					Los yanquis son los enemigos jurados y verdugos que durante la pasada guerra coreana exterminaron indiscriminadamente a los coreanos mediante la guerra bacteriologica y quimica.
					
					Tambien, en el tiempo posbelico ellos introdujeron en gran medida en el suelo surcoreano los pertrechos de extermino masivo incluyendo las armas bioquimicas para eliminar a la nacion coreana, pero no avisaron nada de los datos relacionados a los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Se encuentra detras de la cortina negra el numero de ensayos para la guerra bacteriologica perpetrados por las tropas yanquis en el Sur de Corea y tampoco pueden presumir la cantidad de las peligrosisimas sustancias quimicas toxicas.
					
					Ahora, cuando todo el mundo aspira la paz y la seguridad, jamas podran ser toleradas las maniobras de la guerra bacteriologica de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas tendentes a construir el laboratorio de las armas bioquimicas en la parte Sur del territorio coreano para acarrear la terrible calamidad a los coreanos. 
					
					Este siniestro complot de los yanquis para la guerra bacteriologica ensena a los uniformados y civiles coreanos como deberan realizar la inminente confrontacion antiyanqui.
					
					Nuestro ejercito esta bien preparado para enfrentar con las guerras de todo tipo que desee el imperio yanqui.
					
					El severo castigo no lo podran evitar las perversas maquinaciones de los malvados imperialistas yanquis que se desesperan para llevar la nacion coreana a la catastrofe de la guerra bacteriologica.

articles.title: Constituido comite preparatorio coreano para Congreso de Elogio a Grandes Hombres
articles.content:
Constituido comite preparatorio coreano para Congreso de Elogio a Grandes Hombres
Pyongyang, primero de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo constituido este lunes en esta capital el comite preparatorio coreano para el Congreso de Elogio a Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu de 2017. 
					El ano proximo es el significativo en que se cumpliran el aniversario 105 de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el 75 del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el 100 de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk y el 5 de eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un al cargo cimero del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Estado de Corea. 
					
					Como presidenta del comite fue electa Kim Jong Suk, presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relacione Culturales con el Extranjero y del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con los Pueblos del Mundo; como vicepresidentes, Ri Yong Chol, subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Pak Song Il, vicepresidente del Comite de Radio y Television de Corea, y O Yong Chol, viceministro de Cultura; y como secretario general, Pak Kyong Il, vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con los Pueblos Mundiales. 
					
					La entidad naciente resolvio dinamizar las actividades de diferentes formas para divulgar a todo el mundo las nobles personalidades y proezas de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu y organizar con escrupulosidad las labores para la marcha exitosa del Congreso de Elogio a Grandes Hombres que tendra lugar en el ano 2017 en Pyongyang y en el monte Paektusan, en colaboracion con los comites preparatorios fundados en ambito mundial. 
					
					En medio de la unanime aspiracion de los pueblos progresistas del mundo, se han fundado hasta la fecha los comites preparatorios regionales de Asia-Pacifico, Europa, Africa, America, Oceania y Arabe y mas de 60 comite preparatorios en mas de 50 paises desarrollando diversas festividades.
